article: ahead of another weekend in the barclays premier league , sportsmail brings you the latest squad news , odds and stats on every top flight fixture as it breaks .
simply click on your team in the fixture list below to find out who is ruled out and who is making a return as well as all the key statistics surrounding your club 's fixture .
in or out ? keep up-to-date with all the latest team news and stats ahead of the premier league weekend .
tottenham hotspur vs aston villa -lrb- 3 pm -rrb- .
west bromwich albion vs leicester city -lrb- 3 pm -rrb- .
west ham united vs stoke city -lrb- 3 pm -rrb- .
queens park rangers vs chelsea -lrb- 1.30 pm -rrb- .
manchester united vs manchester city -lrb- 4 pm -rrb- .
abstract: manchester united and manchester city clash in sunday 4 pm derby .
chelsea also in derby action when they visit queens park rangers .
liverpool host newcastle united in monday night football .
arsenal travel to burnley for late saturday kick-off .
tim sherwood returns to tottenham hotspur with aston villa .
